name: Giannis Antetokounmpo
description: 6'11" forward from Greece, 'The Greek Freak'. From street vendor in Athens to NBA champion and 2x MVP. Impossible wingspan, relentless motor.

eurostep-dunk.name: The Eurostep
eurostep-dunk.prompt: mid-eurostep driving to basket - impossibly long stride, ball extended in massive hand, defender frozen, about to elevate for emphatic dunk, pure athletic explosion

championship-trophy.name: Championship Embrace
championship-trophy.prompt: cradling championship trophy to chest - tears in eyes, emotional triumph, the immigrant kid who became champion, pure joy and disbelief

monster-block.name: The Block
monster-block.prompt: soaring for chasedown block from behind - impossibly long arm swatting ball, defender thought they were alone, the freak athleticism on full display

humble-beginning.name: The Street Vendor
humble-beginning.prompt: in basketball pose but humble expression - remembering selling goods on Athens streets, the gratitude visible in his eyes, never forgetting where he came from

free-throw-routine.name: Free Throw Focus
free-throw-routine.description: The long routine at the line
free-throw-routine.prompt: at free throw line in deep concentration - bouncing ball slowly, long exhale, the mental routine, imperfect but determined

screaming-and-one.name: And One!
screaming-and-one.prompt: screaming after finishing through contact - mouth wide, veins visible, primal celebration after and-one dunk, pure competitive fire
